question: Posted By Mary on February 27, 1999 at 07:26:28:In Reply to: Slow Heart Rate with long intervals between beats posted by Mary on February 23, 1999 at 19:11:02:My husband has a slow heart rate (45-60)with long intervals between beats.  He had a monitor on for 24 hours and this showed the above data.  He is a diabetic and he also smokes.  We were told by family Dr. that this could be a malfunction in the sinus node of heart due to the diabetes.  He is going to try to get him in a Cardiologist within the next few days.  My questions is how much is this due to the diabetes and does smoking affect this?Does the doctor not answer all questions?  My orginial has been in forum for a number of days without reply.
title: Re: Slow Heart Rate with long intervals between beats
